features: Shoulder straps, back panel and hip belt are designed ergonomically for maximum comfort with padding and moisture wicking to reduce sweat on the body
Extra external zip pocket on hip belt is easily accessible when wearing the pack to securely stow your cell phone or some of the local currency
Easy-to-use adjustable suspension for improved comfort and a reduced feeling of weight; use the simple hook and loop closure on the back panel to open the flaps and adjust up or down
Quick adjustable torso length is ideal in this unisex pack so that it can be shared within a household or adjusted mid-journey to split the carrying duties
Load lifters and sternum strap offer extra individualized adjustment for added stability
Sternum strap features a safety whistle
Traditional suitcase style butterfly opening reveals two zippered peek-through mesh packing compartments including one with an additional mesh pocket for organization
17” padded laptop sleeve hides in the back of the main compartment, but has dual access points to grab quickly whether at the airport or parked away in your hotel room
Two zippered front panel pockets with mesh slip pockets
Third sizeable mesh packing compartment is accessible from the front of the pack and can also be accessed from u-shaped main duffel opening
Self-repairing lockable zippers with easy grip zipper pulls are designed to keep working for you trip after trip
Lockable top zippers can be double secured with a small padlock looped through the Central Lock Point
Mesh stuffer pocket on front is perfect for containing your wet raincoat and is secured with a bouldering hook
Mesh side pockets are perfect for water bottles and other quick grab items
Compression straps can be used to stow a jacket, plane pillow or extra gear
Durable Bi-Tech™ fabric bottom is abrasion and weather resistant can be wiped down effortlessly
Top, bottom and side haul handles enable easy pickup from any angle
Check-in Rainfly™ offers extra rain protection, but can also be expanded to work as a zipped check-in duffel with handles to contain and protect the full-suspension back panel
Pack is completely covered by the Eagle Creek No Matter What™ Warranty
